categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tharis Orne was a male Human Jedi Master of the Jedi Order. He was considered one of the greatest Jedi Masters of the Order during his time, and his wisdom, knowledge, and personality was later imprinted on the Noetikon of Science. This Noetikon included a complete list of every known biological, chemical and technological diseases, and Orne's personality inhabited the device along with Masters Vandar Tokare and Arca Jeth.
